name: Cosmic Arena
description:
In Cosmic Arena you play as Joshua. Joshua is a college student looking for some extra funds, and the best way for him to get those funds, would be to risk his life. Joshua enters the Cosmic Arena, where he must fend off from aliens and earn a lot of money in the process, but what Joshua doesn't know is that the Arena has no end. Aliens won't stop coming until Joshua is dead.

This game was made for gm(48) #18 for the theme "Space", you can vote for it here!

WARNING: If you're experiencing issues with the web version of the game, try the executable instead (Windows Only)

Controls:
-WASD to move
-Left click to shoot
-Right click for melee
-Space bar to instantly skip to the next wave during intermission
